---
title: "Assignment 3"
---

The the third programming assignment is dedicated to the task of dependency parsing. More specifically, you will implement a simplified version of the dependency parser used by [Glavaš and Vulić (2021)](http://dx.doi.org/10.18653/v1/2021.eacl-main.270).

[Link to the assignment](https://github.com/liu-nlp/dl4nlp/tree/master/website/assignments/assignment3)

**Deadline:** 2024-06-14 (submit via Canvas)
